name: Adoratherapy Room Boost Gift Set
description:
SPRAY. BREATHE, AWAKEN YOUR SENSES. The Room Boost Gift Set is the ultimate room spray collection and includes our 5 - 100ML Metallic Room Boost Bottle in a beautiful match box gift set . Room Boosts are unique and expertly formulated sprays made with organic ingredients designed for home and on the go. Certified vegan and cruelty free. Like “Feng shui for your mood and the mood of your environment,” these versatile mists are a must have for a harmonious home, office, travel and other personal spaces including yoga mats. Includes: Clear Away, Passion, Abundance, Blissful and Serene. Keep one in every room. Adoratherapy products are organic, Vegan, Cruelty Free and made in the USA.

CLEAR AWAY

Distilled water, symbio®solv Clear Plus, essential oils of lavender, ylang ylang, grapefruit, lemon, juniper, rosemary, sage, peppermint, rose absolute, fennel, Verstatil SL non GMO.

ABUNDANCE

Distilled water, symbio®solv Clear Plus, essential oils of patchouli, cinnamon, cardamon, bergamot, clove, white pine, frankincense, vetiver, oak moss, jasmine absolute, Verstatil SL non GMO.

BLISSFUL

Distilled water, symbio®solv Clear Plus, essential oils of blood orange, bergamot, grapefruit, geranium, rosewood, ylang ylang, and patchouli, Verstatil SL non GMO.

SERENE

Distilled water, symbio®solv Clear Plus, essentials oils of lavender, bergamot, lemon, roman chamomile, and geranium, Verstatil SL non GMO.

PASSION

Distilled water, symbio®solv Clear Plus, essential oils of patchouli, juniper, ginger, clove, clary sage, ylang ylang, rose geranium, cardamon, sandalwood, neroli, jasmine and rose absolute, Verstatil SL non GMO.

Bedroom: Spray before you get out of bed for the first breath of the day. Spray on your sheets and pillow before laying to rest.

Home and Office: Spray in the room you are in to shift the energy to the mood you desire

Pets & Children: Spray to provide peace and calm to spaces you share with your family.

Yoga Mat and Meditation: Spray around you before or after your practice for purification and focus.

Travel: Spray around your self in public spaces to shift your energy inwards and release anxiety.

Personal Space: Mist your personal space for energy and recalibration.
